snippet.title: Beat the Machine: Rebooted - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Beat the Machine: Rebooted is a top-down retro arcade shooter developed by Sanguine Studios. Play as Damon, the cocky cadet trying to save Sector VIII from the nasty attacks by the evil mind of T.O.M. Traverse across 20+ levels defeating the virus T.O.M created to gain total control of the Origin Sectors. Choose your way to play with over 60 skills to select from. 

Game releases on April 3rd on steam.

Purchase and Wishlist our game with the link below:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1272240/Beat_The_Machine_Rebooted?utm_source=Trailer&utm_medium=web
